text.text: How can I view my current rates?

text: To view your current rates, you can click on the Charges tab under Settings. You can also view your rates by clicking on the Universal category and adding a date range.

text.text: What actions can be performed using the Charges tab?

text: You can also use the Charges tab to: Change rates Create categories Set future base rates

text.text: Can you explain how to change existing rates for services, mileage, or supplies?

text: To change existing rates, you can go to Settings > Charges tab > Universal category , and edit the amount.

text.text: What is the significance of the effective date when setting future base rates?

text: The effective date is the date that the charge amount will take effect. If you select a date in the future, the system will continue using the amount administered on the Charges page for this HCPCS until the future date arrives.

text.text: How can I create a new charge category?

text: To create a new charge category, you can go to Settings > Charges tab > Add a charge category. You can then add the category name. You can have as many categories as you need.

text.text: When setting up a category with date ranges, what options are available for specifying the effective date and expiration date?

text: When setting up a category with date ranges, you can specify the effective date and expiration date. You can also specify the start date and end date. You must create the charge category before you add a date range.

text.text: Is it possible to apply a category to a claim at any stage of its lifecycle?

text: Yes, you can apply a category to a claim during claim creation, when the claim is suspended, and after the claim was submitted. The process for applying a category to a claim is the same regardless of where the claim is in its lifecycle.

text.text: What are the steps involved in deleting a charge category?

text: To delete a charge category, you can follow these steps: 1. Click Settings > Charges tab > View field > select the category you want to delete > Edit > Edit again > Delete date range button. 2. Click Delete on the confirmation window.

text.text: How can I modify rates for a specific category?

text: To modify rates for a specific category, you can follow these steps: 1. Click Settings > Charges tab > View field > select the category you want to modify > Edit > Change rates as needed > Click Save.

text.text: What are the differences between setting future base rates with and without defined categories ?

text: When you create your first category, the system automatically moves your base rates into a grouping called the Universal category. When you work a claim, the system gives you the option to use your universal rates or apply rates from a category.

text.text: Can you explain how to add a date range to an existing charge category?

text: You must create the charge category before you add a date range.

text.text: What precautions should be taken when setting future base rates?

text: When you set future base rates, you can enter Universal rates that will start in the future (effective date). The system will continue to use the existing rates until the effective date.

text.text: How do I navigate to the Charges tab in ZOLL Billing?

text: To get to the Charges tab, click Settings on the navigation bar.

text.text: What are the benefits of categorizing rates?

text: When you work a claim, the system gives you the option to use your universal rates or apply rates from a category.

text.text: Can you describe the process of applying a category to a claim?

text: The process for applying a category to a claim is the same regardless of where the claim is in its lifecycle. You can apply a category to a claim during claim creation, when the claim is suspended, and after the claim was submitted. On the Charges tab, click the Charge category field and select the category. The rates will be applied to the HCPCS for the claim.

text.text: can i enter base rate while working on charges tab?

text: The Charges tab is not used to enter your base rates - those are entered as you work claims.

text.text: For what purpose can i use Charges?

text: The Charges tab is used to: View your rates, Change rates, Set future base rates, Create categories.

text.text: How can I see my base rates?

text: Once you create a category, your base rates will show under the Universal category.

text.text: how can i change the rate amount?

text: To change the rate amount, you can click the edit icon on the Charges tab. You can then enter the new price per unit and click Save. Editing a rate does not affect existing claims. The new rate will be applied to new claims after the change.

text.text: how can i change the category for changing rate amount?

text: To change the category, you can click the view icon and then the edit icon. You can then enter the new price per unit.

text.text: how can i set future universal rate?

text: To set future universal rates, you can click Settings on the navigation bar and then click the Charges tab. Then, click Add a date range and enter the effective date. The system will continue to use the existing rates until the effective date.

text.text: How to Set future base rates – with define categories

text: To set future base rates, you can click Settings on the navigation bar and then click the Charges tab. Then, click Add a date range and enter the effective date. The system will continue to use the existing rates until the effective date.

text.text: Explain in detail how to create a category.

text: To create a category, you can follow these steps: 1. Click Settings on the navigation bar. 2. Click the Charges tab. 3. Click Add a charge category. 4. Enter the category name. 5. If the category is ongoing, you do not have to put in an effective or end date. 6. Click Continue.

text.text: how do i set up categories with date ranges?

text: To set up categories with date ranges, you can follow these steps: 1. Click Settings on the navigation bar. 2. Click the Charges tab. 3. Click Add a charge category. 4. Enter the category name. 5. Click Continue. 6. Click Add a date range. 7. Enter the effective date (starting date). 8. Click Continue.

text.text: how can i apply a category to claim?

text: To apply a category to a claim, you can follow these steps: 1. On the Charges tab, click the Charge category field and select the category. 2. The rates will be applied to the HCPCS for the claim.

text.text: how can i set a rate category?

text: To set a rate category, you can follow these steps: 1. Click Settings on the navigation bar. 2. Click the Charges tab. 3. Click Add a charge category. 4. Enter the category name. 5. If you want these charge rates to only apply for a specific time period, click Add a date range. 6. Enter the effective date (starting date). 7. Click Continue.

text.text: Selecting a rate category

text: To select a rate category, you can follow these steps: 1. On the Charges tab, click the Charge category field and select the category. 2. The rates will be applied to the HCPCS for the claim.

text.text: How can i delete a charge category?

text: To delete a charge category, you can follow these steps: 1. On the navigation bar, click Settings. 2. On the Settings page, click the Charges tab. 3. Click the View field and select the category you want to delete. 4. Click Edit. 5. The charge category displays on the page. 6. Click Edit again. 7. A pop-up window displays the dates for the category. 8. Click the Delete date range button.

text.text: how can i change the category rates?

text: To change the category rates, you can follow these steps: 1. On the Charges tab under Settings, click the View field and select the Universal category. 2. Click Edit. 3. Add or change rates as needed. 4. Click Save.

text.text: Selecting a rate category

text: To select a rate category, you can click the "Charge category" field and select the category. The rates will be applied to the HCPCS for the claim.
For more information click this: https://help.zollonline.com/billing/Content/Videos.htm?wchannelid=m8t21u1viq&wmediaid=lhnjkg7ojt

text.text: How do i select a rate category?

text: To select a rate category, you can click the "Charge category" field and select the category. The rates will be applied to the HCPCS for the claim.
For more information click this: https://help.zollonline.com/billing/Content/Videos.htm?wchannelid=m8t21u1viq&wmediaid=lhnjkg7ojt

text.text: i want to know about rate category selection

text: A category is a grouping of rates for a specific purpose. You can apply a category to a claim during claim creation, when the claim is suspended, and after the claim was submitted. You can have as many categories as you need.
